article_title: Hamas sets out three-stage plan for ceasefire deal
sentence: Around  1,200  people  were  killed  during  the  Hamas  attacks  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October  last  year.

article_title: Hamas sets out three-stage plan for ceasefire deal
sentence: More  than  27,700  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  at  least  65,000  injured  by  the  war  launched  by  Israel  in  response,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Hamas sets out three-stage plan for ceasefire deal
sentence: Israeli  families  of  hostages  are  growing  ever  more  anxious  about  the  fate  of  their  loved  ones,  particularly  following  disclosures  that  a  fifth  of  the  more  than  130  hostages  remaining  in  Gaza  are  dead.

article_title: Hamas sets out three-stage plan for ceasefire deal
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.
